title: Plat/gold ADC(on bronze alt) LF support
body: I have an account at plat 4 and 1 and gold 5. Im going to be pushing this account to gold before end of season. Looking for a non tilt, ardent playing, support to join me. Got week off work so it will most likely get done over next couple of days. If you are someone who sits on your adc's face and holds hands all game, HMU. Playing now.

replies.body: Hey, Im a plat support main, I have a silver 2 account I could play with. I added you :D
So how come you deleted me after one loss because we had silly teammates? I think maybe someone else needs to be tilt proof :)
Added on both accounts, to try to reach you.
